body_html:
Also, from what I can see in Platform Support Notes in CodePlay website, they do not have support for any AMD GPUs under ubuntu 16.04

For some reason they dropped the note description itself after 0.3.2 docs.
Though, it doesn't make sense. Even a year ago cl_khr_spir was already supported in amd 'latest' closed driver.

@DuncanMcBain do you know perhaps who wrote that part of the readme? And/or why the note "note" is still there, even though people are starting to report successes even on dismembered drivers over unofficial OSs?

@rahasayantan you could or could not be interested to supposed forward-port of fglrx for 16.04 (god knows why it seems just so harder on ubuntu, compared to fedora or arch)
